name: Sensory
description:
Beware: Sensory induce many quick and repetitive luminescent flashes that could be harmfull for epileptic people. Please avoid playing if you're too exhausted or in a room too dark.

Sensory is a first-person Horror game made during our second year at ICAN Paris.

It's a tale of a blind man trying to find an escape route out of a strange and ravaged lab.

In this strange and ravaged place, will the darkness protect you from the horrors that lurk into this place.

Here's the link to our Game Doc (French)

Feel free to leave a comment and i hope you'll enjoy yourself.

Created by:

  • Lucas DUPUIS - Sound Designer / Integrator
  • Thibault CHARPENTIER - 3D Artist
  • Medhi PIERRON - Developper
  • Claire JIQUEL- Level Designer / Game Designer / Documentation
